# svg-toggle

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property                    | Attribute                     | Description                                         | Type     | Default                                                                       |
| --------------------------- | ----------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `preserveAspectRatios`      | `preserve-aspect-ratios`      | Defaults to true                                    | `string` | `undefined`                                                                   |
| `toggleContainerDefinition` | `toggle-container-definition` | Describes the shape of the container of the toggle. | `string` | `<rect ry="50" rx="50" height="100" width="200" id="rect3868" fill="grey" />` |
| `toggleIndicatorDefinition` | `toggle-indicator-definition` | Describes the                                       | `string` | `<circle r="45" cx="150" cy="50" id="path3870-2" fill="red" />`               |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Name           | Description                  |
| -------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `--svg-height` | Height of the toggle control |
| `--svg-width`  | Width of the toggle          |
